channel.title: Yeongdeungpo-gu on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: 5 burning flavors to blow away your stress - Yeongdeungpo-gu, Seoul, Korea
item.description:
Spicy Grilled Feet of <Changsin-dong Spicy Feet>

5 burning flavors to blow away your stress

Yeongdeungpo-gu, Seoul, Korea

In fact, 'taste' has nothing to do with the season. Didn't find hot food in the summer because of the heat. The same is true for winter. The cold noodles called 'cool noodles' were a winter delicacy in the north of Korea. Nevertheless, there is a ‘taste’ that crosses the season. The hot taste of the tip of the nose, the whole body getting hot, and the drops of sweat springing up one by one. Here's a spicy taste that will blow you away from the stress that comes up behind your neck even when you're in tears.

#One. Singil-dong Spicy Champon

The spicy taste of Seoul, the best champon restaurant that comes to mind when you first think of it.
Originally, the food itself has a spicy taste. Among them, spicy is one of the nation's wards, so be prepared. No matter how urgently the champon is, you should prepare a drink that will soothe the extreme spiciness.
When you enter the store, there is a warning saying 'Please don't try Wanpong'. 'Empty, pregnant women, senior citizens, high blood pressure, gastritis, gastric ulcers, bad condition champon absolute envoy' is added. I want to try spicy jjamppong. The appearance is not much different from the champon I've seen so far. Suffering, the pain begins as soon as you take the broth and take it to your mouth. It's spicy and spicy. But my hand keeps going. It is the same as those who ate champon with tears and runny noses. Not much seafood, but good for the price. It's hard, but it's spicy when I turn around. When it's complicated, it disappears as soon as it finds it. It's better to remember the hot soup season. However, be sure to include udon or gimbap for our stomach. We are precious.

#2. I shed tears, spicy pork cutlet, Shindaebang warm pork cutlet
Enjoy pork cutlet for all ages. To what extent can you think of the spicy taste of pork cutlet that is perfect for a weekend family outing? The champon, jokbal, chicken feet, and tteokbokki that are introduced as `` Seoul spicy '' are spicy in the seasoning itself, so it is not difficult to imagine the spicy taste. On the other hand, the cutlet taste is only remembered, but the spicy taste is not well associated. This prejudice (?) Disappears naturally when you look for 'Honjeong Dongas', which is famous for its spicy pork cuts near the Sindaebang Intersection.
Spicy pork cutlet of <warm pork cutlet>
Onjeong Dongas, already introduced several times on TV programs, is a tonkatsu specialty store. From authentic cutlet and fish gas to spicy seasoned cutlet and spicy cutlet. Up to this point, you can not find much difference with the general pork cutlet shop.
Authentic pork cutlet boasting a generous amount at an affordable price
The point is spicy cutlet which is not on the menu. If you eat everything within 20 minutes, you have to pay for free. You can't eat spicy, but if you're a big eater, you can try the giant tonkatsu. If you eat it within 20 minutes, it will be free. If you inhale two inexpensive pork cuts within 10 minutes, you can taste pork cuts for free for 6 months if you inhale within 2 minutes and 5 minutes.
Spicy Pork Cutlet
Rather than ordering spicy tonkatsu from the beginning, try the pork cutlets on the menu. Spicy pork cutlet service to all customers. A quarter of pork cutlet is put in your mouth and spicy. Sweat on your forehead will heat your neck and face. The warning "Galphos + Milk Required" was not okay. It's better to taste this tasting pork cutlet and decide whether to order one.
A piece of spicy (dinda) pork cutlet for tasting
For reference, the reporter ate only one piece, but struggled to shake off the spicy taste that goes through the head and torso. After an hour or so, my stomach started shaking. The first point is to try and taste spicy pork cutlet.
Comparison between regular cutlet and spicy (dish) cutlet
# 3. Delicious spicy, Changsin-dong hot pork feet
What would you have thought about adding spicy sauce to the pig's feet? I think it's a dish equivalent to 'donuts with donuts'.
Changsin-dong Spicy Pig's Feet
Just jogbal does not feel a bit boring, spicy jokbal has no place to think. The meat is as strong and chewy as it is. It also adds spicy rice balls, which makes it a good choice for meals and snacks. Governor Giza also had plenty of food to eat. It's a spicy flavor that keeps going.
Changsin-dong Spicy Pig's Feet
Get off at Dongdaemun Station or Dongmyomae Station, enter Changsin Market, and go out at the entrance. This is the main store. From the beginning of the market, the smell of grilling seasoned pork feet vibrates. The smell is amazing Even when I see it, my stomach becomes full and strong.
Spicy grilled chicken feet. I added rice balls to reduce the spiciness.
If you like lean meat, you can order miniatures if you have better collagen areas with grilled pig feet or assorted pig feet. There is a cool piece to reduce the spiciness.
Spicy Mini
Instead of 'strong medicine' where sweat oozes out of your head like <Shingil-dong Spicy Jjambbong> or <Ondondon Gas>, the smoky spicy taste that makes your lips tingle is attractive.
Spicy Chilled Coolpeace
#4. Eat red pepper, Dongdaemun Yeopgi Tteokbokki
If you really want a spicy taste, there is Dongdaemun Yeopgi Tteokbokki, called `` Yuppteok. '' The tongue tastes spicy but can't stop eating. After eating, you should be ready to walk in and out of the bathroom for about a day. Some people are angry that they are spicy, but once you step here, you will come back to the taste. The addictive spicy taste is a powerful taste that makes modern people suffering from stress forget all of it.
Spicy Tteokbokki Representative Celebrity <Dongdaemun Bizarre Tteokbokki> Basic Set
Steamed eggs and rice balls are a must, and add slush to your mouth. As you sweat, your annoyance disappears, leaving only the mouth and lips pain. Still, the idea of delicious does not disappear. However, no matter how motivated, do not eat soup with a spoon.
Thank you reinforcement spicy, rice balls and steamed egg
Tteokbokki is high on price but high in quantity. Add one saree, enough for three to four people to eat. If you choose set menu, you can taste it a little cheaper.
The most spicy noodles in Tteokbokki
# 5. Delicious spicy Bangi Binja chicken feet
Do you like chicken feet? It's very mysterious and gross, but once you taste it, the slight stipples that the appearance gives you are gone. It is understandable why so many people found chicken feet. delicious. Bony chicken feet are fun to eat with bones, and boneless chicken feet are easy to eat in a bite. Although there are differences depending on each person's taste, I think the whole bone is better to feel the natural taste of chicken feet. Spicy seasoning was added to these chicken feet. Spicy chicken feet are great as both side dishes and side dishes. Dudong!
<Ijinja chicken feet> grilled chicken feet
Like spicy pork feet, chicken feet are a must for rice balls that will reduce the spiciness and prevent heartburn. `` Ijinja Chicken Feet '' is located at the end of Bangi-dong Eat Alley. If you call 20 minutes ago, the chicken fried chicken soup is also good. The chicken feet that are just coming out are spicy, but if you want a stronger spicy taste, you can adjust them when you order them.
Seasoned Chicken Feet Before Roasting
Chicken feet dressed in seasoning are grilled over the grill. Dishes Cooked Roasted chicken feet boast a strong spicy taste with added fire. President Lee Jin-ja, the owner of the restaurant, accepts orders, cooks and pays, so wait. In addition, the opening hours are flexible, so it's a good idea to check beforehand. The system is not equipped, but the chicken feet are known as one know. It is located in the alley next to Bang Middle School.
Grilled chicken feet for grilling
Travel info

1. Nearby restaurants

-Singil-dong Spicy Champon: Exit 1 at Singil Station / 010-5395-1151 / 13: 30 ~ 24: 00 (Closed 23:00 Sunday) / Spicy Champon 8,000, Udon 6,000, Gimbab 2000
-Onjeong Don Gas: Sindaebang Samgeori Station Exit 3 / 02-823-8589 / 10: 30 ~ 21: 00 (Free on success)
-Changsin-dong Spicy Bun: Dongdaemun Station Exit 3 or Dongmyomae Station Exit 8 (Changsin Market) / 02-3675-9689 / 10: 30 ~ 24: 00 (Closed on Mondays) / Spicy Grilled Pig Feet 28,000 won, Coolpeace 2000 won
-Dongdaemun Yeopgi Tteokbokki: Sindang Station Exit 10 (15, Toegye-ro 75-gil, Jung-gu, Seoul) / 02-2234-8592 / 24 hours / Yeopgi Tteokbokki 14,000 won
-Ijinja Chicken Feet: Mongchontoseong Station, Exit 2 (61-10, Ogeum-ro 11-gil, Songpa-gu, Seoul) / 16: 00 ~ 03: 00 KRW, boneless chicken feet 13,000 won, chicken dung house 12,000 won, fried chicken soup 30,000 won

2. Accommodation

24 Guesthouse Jongno Tower Branch: Jongno 31-gil, Jongno-gu / 02-747-1002

http://24guesthousejongnotower.com

Center Mark Hotel: Insadong 5-gil, Jongno-gu (Kwanhoon-dong) / 02-731-1000

http://www.centermarkhotel.com/kor/main/
